translation.about: Contact-19 is a Contact Tracing Platform and Mobile App that tracks where users have been and who they have crossed paths with, monitor contact with infected individuals, helping to avoid exposure, identify people for testing,  and the prevention of widespread infections.
translation.caption: Let’s Help Stop The Spread
translation.pop-text-1: Receive notifications with the latest updates regarding areas you visited
translation.pop-text-2: Your device will log locations you visited during the day
translation.pop-text-3: We remind you to keep contact between you and anyone you meet
translation.pop-text-4: Your device will alert you once you are in a risky range
translation.helps-you-and-others: Help yourself and your country to stop the spread of the Coronavirus (COVID-19)
translation.preferred-mode: Choose your preferred mode for Risk Alerts
translation.how-contact-19-help: How Contact-19 help control & stop the outbreak?
translation.error-msg: Something went wrong! please check your internet connection and try again
translation.permission_error: Contact-19 requires Location & Notification Services, please check application settings.
translation.invalid-mobile-msg: Please enter your correct Mobile Number and try again
translation.enter-code: Enter code sent to your mobile:
translation.invalid-code-msg: Please enter the correct code your received and try again
translation.agree-privacy-terms: By using Contact-19, you agree to our privacy policy & terms of use
